All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Activity
The Activity class represents an activity.
ActivityController
ActivityController class for managing activities in the application.
Client
The Client class represents a client user, extending the User class.
Component
Represents a component with attributes name, type, price, dimensions, supplier ID, and serial number.
ComponentController
This controller manage user actions in Component Menu It allows Supplier to add, edit and delete components and client to view their components.
CreateAccountController
This controller manage user actions in Account Creation Menu It allows the user to create an account as a client or as a supplier
HomepageController
This controller manage user actions in Homepage Menu.
InboxController
Controller class for handling the inbox interface, including notifications and emails.
LoginController
The LoginController class handles the login functionality for clients and suppliers by validating the email and password entered by the user and loading the respective
ProfileController
The ProfileController class is responsible for handling the profile view of the user.
Robot
The Robot class represents a robot.
RobotController
This is the controller that manages user actions in RobotMenu It allows the user to create, display and delete robots
Robotix
 
ShopController
This is the controller that manages user actions in ShopMenu.
Supplier
The Supplier class represents a supplier user, extending the User class.
Task
The Task class represents a task.
User
The User class represents a user.
